headline: The Smartest Oil Stocks to Buy With $200 Right Now
summary: Chevron (NYSE: CVX), Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN), and TotalEnergies (NYSE: TTE) offer three very different ways to dip your toes into oil stocks if you have $200, or more, to put to work.  Chevron is what is known as an integrated energy major.  For example, when oil prices are low and the upstream business is suffering, the downstream businesses will be benefiting from low input costs.
